pullrequest.title: Redo of teleop in GUI plugin

content.raw:
I think there's a bugfix in 87195e6 (pull request $15) that is needed for this branch. When I compile it against gazebo branch haptix_gui and default for everything else, I get this message repeatedly:

[Dbg] [HaptixControlPlugin.cc:1032]  pausing polhemus [1]
hx_getdevicefo() Service call timed out.
[Err] [HaptixGUIPlugin.cc:715] hx_getdeviceinfo(): Request error. Cannot control hand.

I'll review the other pull request and continue testing this once it gets merged.
content.html:
I think there's a bugfix in 87195e6 (pull request $15) that is needed for this branch. When I compile it against gazebo branch haptix_gui and default for everything else, I get this message repeatedly:

[Dbg] [HaptixControlPlugin.cc:1032] pausing polhemus [1] hx_getdevicefo() Service call timed out. [Err] [HaptixGUIPlugin.cc:715] hx_getdeviceinfo(): Request error. Cannot control hand.

I'll review the other pull request and continue testing this once it gets merged.
